Summary: saw a round light in eastern sky that slowly lit up for around 30 seconds then slowly dimmed like as a lantern
trends: There have been no other sightings in lawtell
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back yard looking through my telescope. I was observing the sky with my naked eyes when I seen this light in the east start to light up slowly then was really bright for around 30 seconds then slowly dimmed to dark. I went inside my house to start saving my telescope and came back out around 30 seconds later when I noticed the object(bright light) was now in the north eastern sky around 20 degrees. It stayed bright for around 5 minutes this time move ne then disappeared. Never really saw it moving just shining bright hovering. I cannot explain what I saw I just know what I seen.
